author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Make hits for Calibration cells in the coming HGCal version

#### PR validation:

Tested using a cfg file in SimG4CMS/Calo/test/python for existing and new scenario of Phase2

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx347 Make hits for Calibration cells in the coming HGCal version
